ModMetaData.name: Configurable Texture Patch
ModMetaData.author: Lanilor
ModMetaData.description:
<size=20>Configurable Texture Patch</size>
A selection of different legacy textures. You can choose which textures you want to use in the mod settings menu.
Safe to add or remove to/from existing saves. No restart or reload required after changing a texture in the settings menu for maximum comfort.
